title: Demo page - Segment-Factorized Full-Song Generation on Symbolic Piano Music
description: 39th Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS 2025) Workshop: AI for Music.

sections.name: Generate from scratch
sections.description: The model generates every segment of the song on its own, including the seed segment.

sections.name: Generate from seed
sections.description:
Generation conditioned on a 8-bar seed extracted from songs in test set
 For each seed, we generate songs for these 4 different structures: 
 | # | segments           | compose order (for our model)        |
|---|---------------------------|------------------------|
| 1 | A8 B16 C8 D8 E8           | [2, 0, 1, 3, 4]         |
| 2 | A4 B8 C8 D8 B8 C16 E8     | [2, 5, 1, 4, 3, 0, 6]   |
| 3 | A8 B8 C4 B8 D8 B8 E4      | [1, 0, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]   |
| 4 | A4 B8 C8 A8 C8 A8 D8      | [3, 0, 1, 2, 4, 5, 6]   |
